com.ben.graphics

Class Canvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ben.graphics.Canvas

  • public class Canvas
extends java.lang.Object
    The Canvas object is for use as a container for all Drawable objects. It contains the primary stage, the scene, and the pane in use for a Game. In addition to containing the JavaFX components, it draws the Drawable objects using their draw method. Finally, the class provides a timer to run extra CanvasTasks.
    Author:
    Ben
